text: "Susie Q" is a song written by Dale Hawkins and was originally recorded in 1957. It went to number 16 in Canada. ==Creedence Clearwater Revival version== Creedence Clearwater Revival recorded a version of "Susie Q" in 1968 for their debut studio album Creedence Clearwater Revival. It went to number 11 in the United States and number 10 in Canada. It has many versions of the song have existed over the years. == References == Category:1957 songs Category:Psychedelic rock songs Category:Roots rock songs Category:Acid rock songs Category:Swamp rock songs Category:Creedence Clearwater Revival songs Category:The Rolling Stones songs Category:The Everly Brothers songs Category:Jos√© Feliciano songs Category:Suzi Quatro songs
title: Susie Q (song)
